execution_quality: The agent did not execute the requested command. Instead, it provided an explanation of what the bell command does rather than running the specified script as instructed.
work_category: Command execution task - user requested toggling bell notifications via a shell script invocation.
summary: The agent misinterpreted a slash command (/bell) as requiring explanation rather than execution. When the user clarified with explicit instructions to run the bell-toggle.sh script and show output, the agent had failed to understand the straightforward request, requiring corrective follow-up from the user.
follow_up_pattern: User provided explicit re-instruction to actually run the command and show output without commentary, indicating the agent misunderstood the initial request.
